title: Business Website & Corporate websites
tagline: Modern, responsive websites to grow your brand
details: Full site build with modern design, CMS setup for easy content management, SEO basics to get found online, mobile responsive, and 1-month support to ensure smooth operation.

title: E-Commerce Website
tagline: Start selling online with a professional shop
details: Complete online store with secure payment integration, inventory management, order tracking, customer accounts, and responsive design.

title: Web Application
tagline: Custom web apps tailored to your needs
details: Build powerful web applications with custom functionality, user authentication, database integration, and API development.

title: Portfolio & Personal Brand Websites
tagline: Modern, responsive websites to grow your brand
details: Showcase your work, skills and story. Perfect for creatives, freelancers and professionals.

title: Landing Page Design
tagline: Modern, responsive landing page to grow your brand
details: High-converting landing pages for campaigns, product launches, and lead generation.

title: Website maintenance & Support
tagline: Performance, Protection, Perfection
details: Our maintenance and support services ensure your website stays fast, secure and up to date. From regular backups to bug fixes and perfomance monitoring, we handle the technical side so you can focus on growing your business.

title: Website Redesign & Revamp
tagline: Give your website the upgrade it deserves
details: Your website should evolve as your business grows. We refine your content, structure, visuals and user experience to create a site that feels fresh,fast and future ready.

title: Website Hosting & Domain Setup
tagline: Claim your space on the internet with confidence
details: Your digital journey begins with the right domain and dependable hosting. We help you choose the right domain name, set up fast and secure hosting.

title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
tagline: Turn clicks into customers with SEO that works
details: At Cyrix Digital Solutions, we optimize your site for both people and search engines, combining technical excellence, keyword strategy and content alignment to make your brand stand out online.

title: Brand Identity Package
tagline: Complete branding for your business
details: We craft unique brand identities that capture who you are and what you stand for. From elegant logos to color palettes and typography systems, we create cohesive visuals that make your brand instantly recognizable and unforgettable. Your brand isn’t just a design — it’s an experience.

title: Social Media Graphics
tagline: Engaging visuals for your social channels
details: Your audience scrolls fast — our designs make them stop. We create attention-grabbing visuals tailored for Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, YouTube, and WhatsApp that reflect your brand voice and boost engagement. From posts to stories and ads, we turn your pages into digital showcases that sell.

title: Marketing & Print Design
details: From bold posters to elegant brochures, we bring your brand to life in print. Our designs are crafted to connect emotionally and communicate clearly — whether it’s a business profile, product label, or flyer. Every print piece we design is built to impress, persuade, and leave a lasting mark.

title: Web & UI Design
tagline: Beautiful, functional visuals for websites and apps
details: We design sleek, user-focused web interfaces that merge beauty with functionality. Every element — from color choices to layout — is built to enhance user experience and brand credibility. Whether it’s a landing page mockup or an app interface, our designs help you attract, engage, and convert visitors.

title: Presentation & Document Design
tagline: Turn simple slides or documents into powerful visuals
details: Make every pitch or document a statement of professionalism. We transform plain slides, PDFs, resumes, and proposals into visually compelling materials that communicate your message with confidence and clarity. Perfect for businesses, students, and professionals who want to stand out.

title: Motion & Animated Graphics
tagline: Because your brand deserves more than static visuals
details: Static visuals tell stories — motion makes them unforgettable. We create engaging logo animations, promotional videos, and animated social media ads that breathe life into your brand. Perfect for video intros, marketing campaigns, and digital storytelling that demands attention.

title: Web Design Fundamentals
tagline: Learn to design beautiful websites
details: 8-week course covering HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript responsive design, and modern frameworks. Includes live sessions and project feedback.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
tagline: Master the basics of cybersecurity and take control of your digital safety
details: Learn how cyber threats work, how to secure your personal data and business data. Whether you're a freelancer,student or business owner,this course gives you the confidence to navigate the internet securely and protect what matters most,

title: Advanced Cybersecurity
tagline: Learn how to secure networks, monitor systems and stop breaches before they happen
details: Advanced Cybersecurity is designed for learners who already understand the basics and want to level up to real-world protection and defense and strategies. Dive deeper into network security, ethical hacking, data encryption and threat analysis that keep businesses and systems safe.

title: Computer Packages
tagline: From Zero to Hero. Learn essential computer skills
details: Computer Packages course is designed for beginners who want to master essential computer skills. Whether you're a student, professional or entrepreneur, this course will take you from zero to hero in using popular software like Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and more. Gain confidence in creating documents, spreadsheets, presentations and managing files effectively.

title: Freelancing
tagline: Work Smart. Work Free
details: Discover how to market your skills online, manage clients, and build a safety income as a freelancer. Perfect for creatives, tech enthuasists and anyone ready to work independently.

title: Artificial Intelligence(AI)
tagline: Master the Power of Artificial Intelligence
details: Explore the exciting side of AI and discover how it's changing industries. Learn how artificial intlligence works, where it is used and how you can leverage it.

title: Graphics Design(Canva)
tagline: Design like a Pro using Canva
details: Learn the art of modern design using Canva-from creating stunning social media graphics,professional presentations,logos,posters, Ads, basic video editing and brandkits. Perfect for creatives,marketers and entrepreneurs

title: Digital Strategy Session
tagline: Expert guidance for your digital growth
details: One-on-one consultation for website strategy, SEO, social media, and digital marketing planning.

title: Technical Support
tagline: Ongoing support for your digital presence
details: Monthly retainer for website updates, bug fixes, content updates, and technical support.

title: Business Setup
tagline: Build a business that is ready for the digital age
details: Monthly checkup for your business, content updates, and technical support.

title: Tech & Productivity Systems
